Great story, graphics and gameplay.

Alright.
So I'll start with this:
Most favorite singlie-play, FPS game in all times for me.

Pros:
-Amazing, unforgettable story. Best one I've ever had.
-Unique gameplay and mechanics.
-Nice graphics (For it's time...)
- *Emotional content.*

Cons:
-The controls are a bit confusing, resulting in sometimes wasting half of you power (Vigor) instead of aiming.
-The game is too short, by my opinion. You'll want more.
- *Emotional content.*

To summarize this: The game is worth buying, even now - In 2017. I've never played a FPS game with THAT deep story before - and I've played some. Although the game is too short, I think you'll enjoy playing it again, upgrading different weapons Etc.

10/10, No doubt.

"Booker, are you afraid of god?"
"No. But I am afraid of you."

这是一款有着浓重RPG色彩的FPS游戏，主角可以对自己的装备进行强化或是通过不同的套装组合以达到不同的游戏体验，还拥有各种异能，以此对敌人进行花式虐杀，相当的爽！

但是游戏中补血的物品相当的弱，所以在伊丽莎白的视角中布克就是个翻箱倒柜找苹果三明治狂啃的大吃货- -武器的搭配也是个蛋疼的问题，大威力武器弹药太少，弹药多的威力又不够——打杂兵还好，打某些精英敌人一顿狂扫就见底了，而你在路上捡到的弹药永远不是你当前武器的弹药- -还好伊丽莎白总是总是能在关键时刻丢给你各种补给，真是好[strike] 人妻 [/strike]  女儿！

有人说晕3D？还好我没有[spoiler]但是不知为何玩半条命1有点晕，明明连传送门都没事的[/spoiler]反倒觉得这种在空轨中跳来跳去的设定挺带感的。这个游戏打枪的手感非常不错，是我体验过的几款FPS里最好的，似乎还带有一点辅助瞄准？

下面谈一下剧情：

虽然在玩这个游戏前已经被剧透得差不多了，但丝毫不影响我代入游戏剧情——当伊丽莎白被抓走后我唯一的想法就是把她救出来并杀光所有挡路的人！

我个人是不怕剧透的，我无论是看小说还是电视剧，都会耐不住性子直接翻到后面看看结局是什么再慢慢细细品味过程，这款游戏也是如此。当我已经知道了游戏的悲剧结尾时，再看着男女主角在游戏中的那些美好的一瞬，感受到的却是无比的伤感：我作为玩家只能顺着剧情一步步将主角推向毁灭的深渊，这种无力感实在是令我浑身难受，这令我想起一句话：“喜剧中欢乐是为了让人笑，而悲剧中的欢乐是为了让人在结尾时的悲伤加倍，你曾有多快乐，就得用双倍的悲伤来买单。”

Hum rien à faire j'accroche pas. Je veux bien que le jeu soit beau et nous fasse profiter d'une totale liberté, mais non pour moi ce n'est pas un bioshock. Impossible de retrouver cette ambiance que j'avais trouvée tellement parfaite dans Rapture, avec ces chrosomes totalement déjanté...
Je peux comprendre que le jeu plaise mais je pense qu'ils n'auraient jamais dû le baptiser "Bioshock".
Sorry je passe mon tour sur celui là ;)
สนุกดี

100% must buy, a 100% must buy. 

You'd be astounded by the massive scale, the lengthy scope and rich mechanics and a very high quality plot in Bioshock Inifinite.

This, is the gaming of future and the par that games should look forward to. To push the envolope more and more, to make art and masterpieces. Crytek did it, Irrational Games did it, Naughty Dog did it, and FOX did it. We have nominees for a better gaming future and a good standard for the industry, just need the attention of everybody else. 

The present gaming industry is facing a predicament where the 3A titles' production cost is increasing faster and faster, however doesn't meet the consumability, which doesn't evolve that fast, of the market. This is the reason why IG was winding down by the point of 2014 after they just published this game. 

The technology's speed of evoloution is way too faster to catch up, so either way it's stop making games that pursuing tech-advantages or, using ideas to beat solid materials. And I think, either way, the result is ugly. This left us gamers, and our developers, thinking.

This game is one of the best I've ever played. It is one hell of a ride and you will enjoy every moment of it. If you want a game with awesome story, great gaphics and even better gameplay, then, you are looking at the right game. Buy it, Buy it, Buy it!
And 10/10 would fall in love with Elizabeth.

JOYA

I absolutely love this series. It has one of the most interesting and in depth worlds I have experienced in a first person action game, and the detail put into each scene and every insignificant moment between the main story sections speaks to the loving development the game was put through. Compared to the others in the series I would place Infinite third, the first game second, and Bioshock 2 taking the lead. I know that this is an unconventional take on the series, but the first game was a little too clunky and infinite was too limiting in combat, as well as infinite unloading story on you while you're in the center of a bullet storm. Bioshock 2 was the best of both worlds, with dual wielding and breaks in the action for story. 

Long story short, buy them all, play them all, love them all.

I asked my friend that's a huge gamer "what is a great story telling game?" I'm a movie buff and this was my first game I got as a new PC gamer. 
So my first response was holy s***t this game is amazing!! As a first time gamer I had nothing to base my opinion on and my review of this game was purely on the story and smooth gameplay. 
As soon as I finished the game I called my friend and just started going crazy because the ending was such an emotional rollarcoaster. I was so invested into the game and found the story exactly what I wanted. I would say the story is better than most movie plots in recent years. 
I also liked the voice acting, graphics are beautiful, and soundtrack fits perfectly. 
Again, I have to mention the innovation of this game including Elizabeth's role in the gameplay. 

Honestly, just get the game for the story. Everything else is gravy.

An Amazing game with some very beautiful themes. However, fighting does get excessive, especially in the later stages of the game where you feel like you're forcing yourself to clear entire rooms of enemies just to progress the story.

Com cenários de tirar o fôlego e uma história que te deixa imerso do começo ao fim, BioShock Infinite faz jus a todos os prêmios que foi indicado e principalmente aos que ganhou.

Caso você por algum motivo não goste do jogo, os 20 minutos finais vão fazer você gostar e ficar olhando pra tela do seu PC igual a um idiota.

É um pouco complicado falar sobre esse jogo maravilhoso, sem dar vários spoilers. Caso esteja em dúvida sobre comprar ou não, só vá em frente. Eu juro que não vai se arrepender (A não ser que você seja desses chatos que querem ir contra tudo e todos :v).
Jogo muito bom, recomendo demais.

Это не просто игра, это аттракцион эмоций, просто настоящий вынос мозга в хорошем смысле, конечно же. Барри Аллен, е*ущий таймлайн, смотрит на Элизабет и нервно курит в спидфорсе. Здесь все так тонко и хитро устроенно (я имею в виду сюжет и пространственно-временные парадоксы), что даже после 3-его, уже полностью осмысленного прохождения сюжетной линии оригинальной игры и дополнений (предыдущие 2 раза прошел на пиратке, поэтому не удивляйтесь почему так мало наигранных часов), все равно остаёшься в приятном недоумении от всего пройденного. Если вы думаете, что раскрыли все тайны и вам кажется все довольно ясно, то вы очень, ОЧЕНЬ сильно ошибаетесь. Думайте сами, стройте теории сами, решайте сами...

Господи, 10 констант и переменных из бесконечного множества. 

P.S.: Я не плачу, просто гениальный сюжет в глаз попал...ну и Лизка <3

Rich story set in a detailed atmosphere full of vibrant colors and interesting concepts. Even back when it came out in the 360 it was a masterpiece and still is. I'd just wish for a future more open world version of this awesome game. Years later it is still a really good game.

Como todo Bioshock, su historia es de un nivel difícil de encontrar en cualquier otro juego (sobre todo shooters). Todo, desde el desarrollo de personajes, la música y la ambientación superaron por mucho a sus predecesores (que me siguen pareciendo increíbles). Aunque extrañe alguna de las mecánicas antiguas, esta nueva entrega de la saga trae muchas innovaciones interesantes a la jugabilidad.
Un juego que no te podés perder.

[b]Voor de mensen die te lui zijn om te lezen, een korte samenvatting: 7/10, koop het tijdens een sale en negeer de DLC.[/b]

Als je een fan bent van RPG's en de eerdere Bioshock games, zou ik dit spel van harte aanbevelen. Je speelt als Booker DeWitt, een privédetective die op een missie gaat om een meid genaamd Elizabeth uit Columbia (een vliegende stad, dit keer niet op de bodem van de oceaan) te bevrijden. Uiteraard gaat dit niet zoals verwacht en blijkt er veel meer aan de hand te zijn. Om niet te veel te spoilen zal ik het er op houden dat het verhaal goed geschreven is en na afronding nog enige tijd in je hoofd rond zal spoken. Ook zijn de omgevingen zeer gedetailleerd en goed uitgewerkt, en is het een geweldige ervaring om door de stad Columbia rond te lopen. Zelfs 3 jaar na uitkomst is het een van de mooiste games die ik ooit heb gezien. 

Het spel is echter zeker niet perfect. De combat schiet over het algemeen te kort met een waardeloos wapensysteem en  hersenloze vijanden die nauwelijks tactieken toepassen, dus verwacht geen vloeiende scenes à la Battlefield of Call of Duty. Verder duurt het ongeveer 12-16 uur om dit spel uit te spelen. Het verhaal is vrij lineair en heeft nagenoeg geen keuzemomenten, waardoor er weinig reden is om het nog een tweede keer te spelen. Naar mijn mening is daarom de huidige prijs van €30 voor dit spel te veel, en zou ik dus aanraden om het tijdens een sale te kopen (op moment van schrijven is het in de aanbieding voor €15, wat een goede prijs is). Daarnaast is de DLC voor dit spel vrij matig tot slecht en zou ik niet aanraden om dit erbij te kopen.

По непонятной причине в играх крайне непопулярен стимпанк. И это при всей широте возможностей, которые открывает этот жанр! Создатели Bioshock Infinite великолепно это показали, передав атмосферу паровой утопии наилучшим образом. Смена декораций, знакомых по первым частям, смущает лишь первые несколько минут. Затем же на смену смущению приходит восторг. Определенно, это игра достойна награды в своей номинации!

This was honestly one of the best games I've played. I love the whole series but this one takes the cake out of all of them! every game has its faults and infinite is no different, but overall very enjoyable experience. if you liked the previous games you'll like this one and if you hated the pervious games you'd probably still like this one, its a very different experience from the others.

I do have to say it was a little too linear compared to the previous ones, there's very little room to explore or wander from the path or story. some games are like that, I suppose. had there been more off the path secrets or lore it would have enhanced the experience a bit more.
is gud

Definitively recommend this game, and Bioshock 1 (not a big fan of the 2nd one). But to start with Infinite it's not really necessary to have played this franchise before. I played Infinite first then took a liking to it and played the first one, who ultimately are connected later in the DLCs of Infinite (which are VERY story rich, like the final season to your favorite show it is important you play Buried at Sea).
If you're looking for a game in which you can submerge, this is one of those games. The vintage (and veeeery subtle cyber/metal/ish) decor is dense and the storyline is delicately woven, of course knowing the ending makes you sit in front of your screen for thirty minutes after blowing your brain; a REAL, shock. Plus, it has a light-hearted philosophical side that meddles with the science. 

I love love love this franchise and this precise game which I've replayed numerous times and never regretted buying it!
C'est bien mais bon, pas vraiment la merveille vendue par les critiques et certains joueurs.
